title: Taehoon Kwon
subtitle: DEVELOPER, EDUCATOR, WRITER
description: Develop, Educate, and Write. Taehoon Kwon develop the web and apps, and the web uses React, Typescript. Use Flutter to develop cross platforms and Swift to develop iOS apps. Create a server using FastAPI and Node.js. And solving algorithm problems with Python. I teach coding for free and study teaching. I am writing using various platforms and try to write something far from development.
